product_name: The North Face Base Camp Gear Box - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A companion to either The North Face Base Camp Board Roller or Ski Roller bags, The North Face Base Camp Gear Box offers plenty of gear-hauling capacity. Tri-clip system lets you quickly and securely attach the Gear Box to either The North Face Base Camp Board Roller or Ski Roller bags (not included). Hide-away shoulder straps let you convert the Gear Box into a backpack for day trips or simplified carrying on its own. 2-way clamshell zipper makes it easy to access your gear inside; tough lining helps protect gear and bag. Exterior zip pocket stows on-the-go essentials for convenient access. The North Face Base Camp Gear Box also features multiple haul handles and lash points. Closeout.
short_description: A companion to either The North Face Base Camp Board Roller or Ski Roller bags, The North Face Base Camp Gear Box offers plenty of gear-hauling capacity.
